M608.description: Print or configure slave settings for stepper motors.
M608.usage notes: Configures a stepper to act as a slave to another stepper.  Slave mode enables using steppers on independent drivers to be configured to act identically, avoiding using a single stepper to drive two motors - a common scenario for Z on cartesian printers.

examples.explanation: Set H as a slave to Z.
Clear any slave configuration for Z.
